name: Neko Snatch Demo
description:
Game May Take a Few Minutes to Load for the First Time.

(In Development)

What is Neko Snatch?

Neko Snatch is an adorable puzzle game for PC (and soon your phone as well!)

Tap the screen to launch hungry-hungry-kitties at the object of their desire.

Shoot for the moon! (literally)

Also shoot for

-Dream Catchers

-Fidget Spinners

-Other Planets

and So Much More!!1
